chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The hamsters and the oysters agree to battle it out in a competition.  The hamsters have one condition though - it must be a wheel running competition in the hamster cage.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " shell " to " sei ", the original meaning is reward, and it used to be called sacrifice to reward gods. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Baoye. Congbei, Sai Shengsheng." Han Wangchong "Lunheng‧ Discrimination": "Xiang Yu attacked Xiang'an, Xiang'an has no scorn, and it may not be without prayer."

" Game " can mean a game. "The Biography of Wei Shu‧ Rencheng Wang Cheng": "Te Ling Cheng is a seven-character rhyme, and he went back and forth with the emperor in a gambling game, and was extremely happy.

" Sai " also means victory. Liu Yuxi of the Tang Dynasty "Appreciating Peony Flowers in Si'an Nanshu": "With this beautiful color, the heavenly religions will be played in the evening."

The " match " also said it was over and over. Song Zhao Changqing "Qingpingle•Qiusheng": "He Rili's famous club competition, I am sad to laugh."
humanum_short_description_en: From " shell " to " sei ", the original meaning is reward, and it used to be called sacrifice to reward gods.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「塞」省聲，本義為酬報，舊時祭祀酬神之稱。《說文新附》：「報也。从貝，塞省聲。」漢王充《論衡‧辨祟》：「項羽攻襄安，襄安無譙類，未必不禱賽也。」

　　「賽」可表示比賽。《魏書‧任城王澄傳》：「特令澄為七言連韻，與高祖往復賭賽，遂至極歡。」

　　「賽」也表示勝過。唐劉禹錫〈思黯南墅賞牡丹花〉：「有此傾城好顏色，天教晚發賽諸花。」

　　「賽」還表示完畢、了結。宋趙長卿〈清平樂‧秋聲〉：「何日利名俱賽，為予笑下愁城。」
humanum_short_description: 從「貝」，「塞」省聲，本義為酬報，舊時祭祀酬神之稱。

Chinese: The oyster lives in the tank and the hamster in the hamster cage, but they can see each other so they like to have little competitions for fun.
Meaning: competition
Hanzi: 赛
Story: The hamsters and the oysters agree to battle it out in a competition. The hamsters have one condition though - it must be a wheel running competition in the hamster cage.
Kind: traditional

從「 貝 」，「 塞 」省聲，本義為酬報，舊時祭祀酬神之稱。《說文新附》：「報也。从貝，塞省聲。」漢王充《論衡‧辨祟》：「項羽攻襄安，襄安無譙類，未必不禱賽也。」 「 賽 」可表示比賽。《魏書‧任城王澄傳》：「特令澄為七言連韻，與高祖往復賭賽，遂至極歡。」 「 賽 」也表示勝過。唐劉禹錫〈思黯南墅賞牡丹花〉：「有此傾城好顏色，天教晚發賽諸花。」 「 賽 」還表示完畢、了結。宋趙長卿〈清平樂‧秋聲〉：「何日利名俱賽，為予笑下愁城。」
From " shell" to " sei", the original meaning is reward, and it used to be called sacrifice to reward gods. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Baoye. Congbei, Sai Shengsheng." Han Wangchong "Lunheng‧ Discrimination": "Xiang Yu attacked Xiang'an, Xiang'an has no scorn, and it may not be without prayer." " Game" can mean a game. "The Biography of Wei Shu‧ Rencheng Wang Cheng": "Te Ling Cheng is a seven-character rhyme, and he went back and forth with the emperor in a gambling game, and was extremely happy. " Sai" also means victory. Liu Yuxi of the Tang Dynasty "Appreciating Peony Flowers in Si'an Nanshu": "With this beautiful color, the heavenly religions will be played in the evening." The " match" also said it was over and over. Song Zhao Changqing "Qingpingle•Qiusheng": "He Rili's famous club competition, I am sad to laugh."

賽字的基本解释

賽
sài
见“赛”。

賽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sài］
［《廣韻》先代切，去代，心。］
“赛1”的繁体字。
(1)酬报。旧时祭祀酬神之称。
(2)比，比赛。
(3)胜过；如同。
(4)很，甚。
(5)完毕，了结。
(6)姓。明有赛从俭。

賽字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賽； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1211第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?先代切，音塞。【說文】報也。【長箋】今俗報祭曰賽神，借相誇勝曰賽。【韓愈·城南聮句】賽饌木盤簇。　又【韻會】通作塞。【周禮·春官·都宗人】旣祭，反命於國。【註】祭謂報塞也。【前漢·郊祀志】冬塞禱祠。【註】師古曰：塞，謂報其所祈也。【急就篇】謁禓賽禱鬼神寵。【王應釋·音釋】?本賽作塞。

賽字的源字形

小篆楷体

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sài］
["Guangyun" cut from generation to generation, to generation, heart. ]
Traditional characters for "赛1".
(1) Remuneration. In the old days, it was known as offering sacrifices to the gods.
(2) Comparison, competition.
(3) To overcome; as.
(4) Very, very.
(5) It's over, it's over.
(6) Last name. Obviously there is competition from thrift.
